sentence.Network_en: Smallness is the antithesis of largeness.
The might have repercussions of unimaginable largeness.

means.word_mean: 1. the property of having a relatively great size

auth_sentence.content: "I don't think so," Elsie answered, her voice losing its movie-screen largeness and becoming small, with a childish quaver.

auth_sentence.content: Plummer, who is turning eighty himself, effortlessly suggests largeness of spirit even in foolish old age.
